attributes.action: support our call for a Five-Nations football tournament next Summer
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In light of recent results England, Scotland, North Ireland, Wales and the Republic of Ireland will not be playing in Euro 2008, therefore, we would like to see England take part in a Home Internationals tournament next summer. The other four nations are in the process of forming a Celtic Cup next Summer and we would like to see England join this tournament.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
